page.title: 18 HOME LIFE
page.content: MY HOUSE IS A SCOTTISH SPECIAL HOUSING ASSOCIATION HOUSE. IT IS TERRACED AND HAS TWO STOREYS. FROM THE OUTSIDE IT LOOKS RATHER SMALL BUT IT IS THE BIGGEST IN THE BLOCK.IT HAS A GREEN DOOR AND FAWN HARLING ON THE WALLS. INSIDE THE DOOR AND TO THE LEFT IS THE LIVING ROOM WHERE WE HAVE MOST FACILITIES LIKE A THREE PIECE SUITE, TELEVISION,TAPE RECORDER,WALL UNIT AND A COAL FIRE. FROM THIS ROOM WE CAN GO INTO THE KITCHEN WHERE WE HAVE A SINK, COOKER, FRIDGE,WASHING MACHINE AND A TABLE. COMING IN THE FRONT DOOR IS THE STAIRS AT THE TOP OF WHICH IS THE BATHROOM.MY BEDROOM IS CLOSE BY AND I HAVE A BED, CABINET AND A CHEST OF DRAWERS. MY SISTER ASHLEY'S ROOM IS NEXT TO MINE AND NEXT TO THAT IS MY MUM'S ROOM WHICH HAS A DOUBLE BED, A WALL UNIT AND A MIRROR. BY BILLIE WHITFIELD.(AGED 11)
